mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID AS NOTICEID, NOTICE_WRITER AS NOTICEWRITER, NOTICE_TITLE AS NOTICETITLE, NOTICE_SUBJECT AS NOTICESUBJECT, NOTICE_DATE AS NOTICEDATE, NOTICE_HIT AS NOTICEHIT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(NOTICE_ID)+1 AS NOTICEID FROM NOTICE
INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_DATE) VALUES (#{noticeId}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_HIT = NOTICE_HIT +1 WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{id}
